articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.title: Meta fined a record $1.3 billion over EU user data transfers to the U.S. - CNBC
articles.description: Meta has been fined a record 1.2 billion euro ($1.3 billion) by European privacy regulators over the transfer of EU user data to the U.S.
articles.content:
Meta has been fined a record 1.2 billion euro ($1.3 billion) by European privacy regulators over the transfer of EU user data to the U.S.
